title: Dracula's Guest and Other Stories
description: 6 Vampire-themed short stories from the 1800s and early 1900s:The Dark Castle by Marion BrandonThe Cloak by Robert BlochThe Hunt by Joseph Payne BrennanDracula's Guest by Bram StokerBat's Belfry by August W. DerlethFor the Blood Is the Life by Francis Marion Crawford
author: Vic Ghidalia
